List <JBCXM__Alert__c> alertList = new List <JBCXM__Alert__c> ();
Map<String, Id> idBySysName = new Map<String, Id>();
List<String> catList = new List<String>{'Alert reason', 'Alert Severity', 'Alert Type', 'Alert Status'};
List<String> aSList = new List<String>();
List<String> aRList = new List<String>();
List<String> aTList = new List<String>();
for(JBCXM__PickList__c plo : [SELECT Id, JBCXM__SystemName__c, JBCXM__Category__c FROM JBCXM__PickList__c WHERE JBCXM__Category__c IN: catList]) {
	idBySysName.put(plo.JBCXM__SystemName__c, plo.Id);
	if(plo.JBCXM__Category__c == 'Alert Severity') {
		aSList.add(plo.id);
	}
	else if(plo.JBCXM__Category__c == 'Alert reason') {
		aRList.add(plo.id);
	}
	else if(plo.JBCXM__Category__c == 'Alert Type') {
		aTList.add(plo.id);
	}
}
JBCXM__Alert__c alertObj;
Integer i = 1;
Integer j = 1;
Integer k = 1;
For(JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c cio : [SELECT Id, JBCXM__Account__c, JBCXM__Account__r.Name FROM JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c LIMIT 100]) {
	for(Integer l = 0; l < 3; l++) {	alertObj = new JBCXM__Alert__c(
										name = 'This is alert sample subject + ' + cio.JBCXM__Account__r.Name,
										JBCXM__Account__c = cio.JBCXM__Account__c,
										JBCXM__Severity__c = aSList.get(i),
										JBCXM__Reason__c = aRList.get(j),
										JBCXM__Status__c = idBySysName.get('Active'),
										JBCXM__Type__c = aTList.get(k),
										JBCXM__Comment__c = 'You can also use version settings to associate a class or ',
										JBCXM__Date__c = Date.today(),
										JBCXM__NextStepDate__c = (Date.today()).addDays(6),
										JBCXM__NextStepOwner__c = 'Sample User',
										JBCXM__NextStepComment__c = 'The AWS re: Invent conference is only 43 days away and we wanted to share a few exciting updates with you.',
										JBCXM__ASV__c = 1200,
										JBCXM__MRR__c = 100);
	alertList.add(alertObj);
	i++;
	j++;
	k++;
	if(i == aSList.size()) i =0;
	if(j == aRList.size()) j =0;
	if(k == aTList.size()) k =0;

	}
}
insert alertList;
